items.title: Charter is bleeding internet subscribers — and the stock could see its worst day ever
items.description: A downbeat earnings report, plus investor disdain for the pending Cox Communications merger, is sending the stock to a one-year low.

items.title: PayPal’s ‘battleground’ stock heads for longest winning streak in years. Earnings are on deck.
items.description: PayPal’s stock is on track to rise for the eighth session in a row, but analysts have a hard time making a call about the future.

items.title: Social Security Administration quietly corrects blog on taxation of benefits — but confusion persists
items.description: Public comments on the agency’s blog show beneficiaries remain confused about the new law.

items.title: AutoNation’s stock rises as higher car prices help it beat sales and profit estimates
items.description: Customers shrugged off higher prices and drove up sales, while AutoNation said it’s well positioned to handle higher tariffs.

items.title: Author Geraldine Brooks learned some hard personal-finance lessons when her husband died unexpectedly
items.description: “Memorial Days” is a memoir of grief, but also a practical reminder of the impact of money on anyone’s life.
